name: RTL Ski Springen 2002 mit Martin Schmitt
overview: RTL ski jumping 2002 with Martin Schmitt. The game for winter sports number 1! In first-class 3D graphics and with 20 hills of the World Cup season 2001/2002 including the Olympic hills of Salt Lake City, ski jumping is the most comprehensive and entertaining ski jumping game in 2002, which is currently available for the Playstation. Create your own players and look after their careers for years. Collect prize money and thereby improve your equipment. Bring the winter into the house and experience up close the fascination of this winter sport with RTL ski jumping 2002! A total of 20 ski jumps, the competition module "Virtual Mode" as well as many other news will make the game as boring as the big multimedia part with all information about ski jumping. Get started and jump to victory on your own or with your team under World Cup rules!
